title: 'Godzilla': A Fire-Breathing Behemoth Returns To The Big Screen
teaser: In the Japanese original, he was a thinly disguised symbol of the atom bomb, but in later films he fought other giant monsters and even space aliens. The latest Godzilla is directed by Gareth Edwards.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
